textContent:
A native of nearby Coon Valley,  

With over a decade of experience in nonprofit leadership, education, and community engagement, 
 
Most recently, Allyson served as International Relations Education Coordinator for the U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Committee, managing global programming and international leadership development.

Prior to that, she spent several years at Gundersen Medical Foundation in La Crosse, where she led fundraising efforts, 

She holds a Master’s Degree in Organizational Leadership from St. Mary’s University of Minnesota and a Bachelor’s in Sport Management and Sociology from UW-La Crosse.
title: Allyson
textContentHtml:
A native of nearby Coon Valley,  


With over a decade of experience in nonprofit leadership, education, and community engagement, 

 

Most recently, Allyson served as International Relations Education Coordinator for the U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Committee, managing global programming and international leadership development.


Prior to that, she spent several years at Gundersen Medical Foundation in La Crosse, where she led fundraising efforts, 


She holds a Master’s Degree in Organizational Leadership from St. Mary’s University of Minnesota and a Bachelor’s in Sport Management and Sociology from UW-La Crosse.
